CHAT.comment: MAC'S SHELL SERVICE, INC., ET AL., Petitioners v. SHELL OIL PRODUCTS COMPANY, LLC, ET AL.; And SHELL OIL PRODUCTS COMPANY, LLC, ET AL., Petitioners v. MAC'S SHELL SERVICE, INC., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:02 a.m. Alderson Reporting Company
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY A. LAMKEN ON BEHALF OF SHELL OIL PRODUCTS COMPANY, LLC, ET AL.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID O'NEIL ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING SHELL OIL PRODUCTS COMPANY, LLC, ET AL.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN F. FARRAHER, JR., ON BEHALF OF MAC'S SHELL SERVICE, INC., ET AL.
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY A. LAMKEN ON BEHALF OF SHELL OIL PRODUCTS COMPANY, LLC, ET AL.
(Whereupon, at 10:57 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
